DESCRIPTIONS.terms_conditions_2: Please review the terms and conditions contained herein carefully. By clicking “I agree” or accessing and/or using any C4E Product (the “Product”) on the C4E Website at https://wallet.c4e.io  (the “Website”), provided by C4E DAO AG, You have read, understood, and accepted all of the following terms, as well as all of the terms which are incorporated herein by reference.
DESCRIPTIONS.rights_obligations:
The following terms and conditions (the “Terms”) constitute a binding agreement between C4E DAO AG, a company duly incorporated under the laws of Switzerland, with registered office at Dammstrasse 16, 6300 Zug, hereinafter referred to as “The Company”, and the person, persons, or entity (“You” or “Your”) accessing and/or using C4E Platform. The platform includes code licensed under third-party license agreements, including open source made available or provided with the software.
By accessing and/or using the C4E Platform, You have read, understood, and accepted all of the following Terms and agree to be legally bound by these Terms, in their most recent version; You further represent and warrant that: You have the right, power and authority to enter into these Terms on behalf of such corporation, governmental organization or other legal entity and to legally bind it to these Terms.
Your access and/or use of the Product is contingent upon Your acceptance of these Terms.
The Company may amend these Terms at any time. Amendments will be effective 24 (twentyfour) hours after the modified terms and conditions have been posted on C4E’s Website and/or Sent via e-mail to You, except for amendments that relate to new features or made for legal reasons, which will become effective immediately. If You do not agree to such modified terms, You should discontinue Your use of the Product.
DESCRIPTIONS.product:
The Product is a free, open-source, client-side software interface that allows You to interact directly with the CHain4Energy blockchain (the “Blockchain”), while remaining in full control of Your keys and assets.
When You access certain features of the Services, you will be able to create a wallet and/or access a wallet to perform a variety of transactions. By creating a wallet, You will receive a key and set up a password, but no account will be set up on the Website. All Your assets are on the Blockchain itself, and the Company has no control over them, neither the Company has access to Your wallet’s keys and/or passwords. No data leaves Your device or Your browser. The Company does not collect or hold any information on Your wallet or your activity. The Company cannot access wallets; recover keys, passwords, or other information; reset passwords; or reverse transactions. You are solely responsible for Your use of the Product, including without limitation for storing, backing-up, and maintaining the confidentiality of Your keys, passwords, and information, and for the security of any transactions You perform using the Website. You expressly relieve and release the Company from any and all liability and/or loss arising from your use of the Product.

DESCRIPTIONS.obligations_warranties_2: You are 18 years of age or older and that You agree to abide by this Terms and Condition.
DESCRIPTIONS.obligations_warranties_3: You will only use the Product for Permitted Use.
DESCRIPTIONS.obligations_warranties_4: Except for the open source contents of the Website, You will not modify, adapt, translate, reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble, or create derivative works in whole or in part with respect to the Product.
DESCRIPTIONS.obligations_warranties_5: You will not do anything to harm The Company’s reputation including C4E’s Products or Services. Including any representations about the Product provided.
DESCRIPTIONS.obligations_warranties_6: The Product is provided "as is," without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non infringement. In no event shall the authors or copyright holders be liable for any claim, damages or other liability, whether in an action of contract, tort or otherwise, arising from, out of or in connection with the software or the use or other dealings in the software.
DESCRIPTIONS.compliance_audit: You must only access and use the Product for a bona fide and Lawful business use. You shall in connection with the use of the Product comply with all legislation, regulations, and other rules having equivalent force which are applicable to that party, including the Privacy Laws and all other Laws, rules and regulations that relate to the privacy, protection, use or disclosure of Personal Information, and any subordinate or associated regulations. You must comply with all Privacy Laws in relation to Personal Information.
DESCRIPTIONS.service_limitations: The Company will make reasonable efforts to keep the Product operational. However, certain technical difficulties or maintenance may, from time to time, result in temporary interruptions. To the extent permissible under applicable law, The Company reserves the right, periodically and at any time, to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, functions and features of the Product, with or without notice, without liability to You, for any interruption, modification, or discontinuation of the Services or any function or feature thereof.

DESCRIPTIONS.privacy_policy_1: The C4E DAO AG ("C4E") reserves the right to vary or amend this Privacy Policy Statement at any time. The most recent version of the Privacy Policy Statement will govern our use of your information and will always be available on the C4E Website. By continuing to access or use this Website after any changes become effective, you agree to accept the revised Privacy Policy. Please visit this Privacy Policy Statement on a regular basis to ensure that you have read the latest version. This Privacy Policy Statement was updated the last time on the date indicated at the end of the statement.
DESCRIPTIONS.privacy_policy_2: C4E is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy concerns the entire online collection of personal data on the C4E Website over the World Wide Web and describes how your personal data is collected and used and how C4E fulfills its obligations under applicable data protection law.
DESCRIPTIONS.privacy_policy_3: The headings used for each of the paragraphs of this Privacy Policy Statement do not affect its interpretation. “You” means a user of this C4E Website. “We” means C4E DAO AG. “User data” or “data” means personal data that has been collected from users through various functionalities of the C4E Website or by the use of an e-mail address given on the C4E Website. “Personal data” means information relating to an identified or identifiable person.
DESCRIPTIONS.additional_local_information: C4E is company duly incorporated under the laws of Switzerland active in the software development and IT field.
DESCRIPTIONS.how_is_your_data_collected_1:
We may collect personal data from you over the C4E Website in the following ways:
You provide personal information to us, in particular your contact data like name and e-mail address, by using the various functionalities of the C4E Website (e.g. commenting functionality, subscription functionality, ordering functionality) or by sending information to a C4E e-mail address given on the C4E Website.
DESCRIPTIONS.how_is_your_data_collected_2: You provide additional personal information to us which we may request from you from time to time following on from any contact you have made with us through the C4E Website. Such information may be necessary or unnecessary (optional) for the provision of services on this Website as indicated in any particular case. In no event, however, are you requested to provide confidential or sensitive personal data about you or other persons. Please avoid sending us such types of data.
DESCRIPTIONS.how_is_your_data_collected_3: If you access the C4E Website or use services available via the C4E Website, your connection data will be collected by our servers and/or through cookies that may be placed in your computer (see below). Our servers will store your IP address in log files by which your computer can be identified as well as certain other connection data (e.g. time and amount of transferred data, product and release information from your Internet browser).
DESCRIPTIONS.use_of_cookies: C4E uses tracking technology such as cookies to gather connection data and to understand how users use the C4E Website. A cookie is an element of data that a website can send to your computer’s browser so that this computer will be recognized by the site on the user’s return. Cookies allow the web server to recognize your computer on connection to our Website, which in turn allows the server to make downloading of pages faster than on first viewing. Also cookies may be used to establish statistics about the use of this Website by gathering and analyzing various data (e.g. most visited pages, time spent by users on visited pages, etc.). Cookies will not be used to monitor website visits of a particular individual. Cookies placed on your computer will not be kept longer than necessary for the purposes indicated. It is possible to set the browser on your computer to notify you when a cookie is being recorded on your computer’s hard drive. It is generally also possible to set the browser to prevent cookies from being recorded on your computer. For the optimal use of this Website, however, we recommend that you do not block the recording of cookies on your computer. The procedure for refusal of cookies may differ depending on the software product. You may check with your software helpdesk or software supplier if you wish to refuse cookies. If you choose not to receive cookies, you may not be able to use certain functionalities or pages of this Website.

how_is_your_data_used.head: The user data collected over the C4E Website is processed for the following purposes:
how_is_your_data_used.1: We will use your connection data for statistical purposes and to manage and improve the usability of the C4E Website by means of particular software (e.g. Google analytics) or cookies (see use of cookies).
how_is_your_data_used.2: We will use your contact data to (i) answer any queries you have about this Website and to notify you of any changes to this Website; (ii) provide you with information you have requested (subscription functionality); and (iii) inform you about C4E and events that may be of interest to you (marketing activities), unless you inform us that you wish not to receive any promotion material from C4E (see Terms of Use).
how_is_your_data_used.3: We will include your comments that you provide through the commenting functionality of this Website or otherwise in anonymous reports, statistics, surveys and pools which we make available on this Website. However, these types of information will not enable readers to identify individuals or individual businesses. Your comments are made available on this Website in anonymous form, unless you have expressly agreed otherwise.

DESCRIPTIONS.data_disclosure_to_third_parties: We will not disclose your personal data to third parties, except for the following: (1) disclosure of data if legally required or ordered by an authority or a court; (2) disclosure of data to external service providers who support C4E in the area of data processing or otherwise; (3) disclosure of data to third parties in corporate reorganizations, disposals or acquisitions; (4) disclosure of data to third parties if necessary to protect the interests of C4E or other users.
DESCRIPTIONS.data_disclosure_to_third_parties_2: We will not sell, rent, distribute or otherwise make your contact or other data commercially available to any third party, except with your prior permission.
DESCRIPTIONS.data_storage: Any data you send over the Internet to the C4E Website is stored and processed in a decentralized way and is processed according to applicable data protection and privacy laws. Some data will also be stored on servers of the C4E Company.
DESCRIPTIONS.data_storage_2: Accordingly, your personal data will be transferred to and processed in locations outside the country in which you are viewing this Website (the “User Country”). Any data or material sent or uploaded by you will be accessible in countries outside the User Country. If your User Country is within the European Economic Area (“EEA”) or is Switzerland or another country providing an adequate level of data protection, please note that your personal data will also be accessible and processed in countries with a lower level of data protection. In these situations C4E will ensure (by entering into a written agreement or otherwise) that an adequate level of data protection is maintained by the recipients of your data in accordance with applicable data protection law.
DESCRIPTIONS.storage_of_emails: All incoming and outgoing e-mail messages are automatically stored in the C4E Electronic Message Repository for the purpose of preserving the evidential weight of e-mails. The e-mails are protected by legal, technical and organizational measures and are processed according to applicable data protection and privacy laws. They may only be accessed in justified cases in accordance with applicable laws and regulations (e.g. court order, suspicion of criminal conduct, breach of regulatory obligations, material breach of employment contract). Access is only granted to employees of the C4E  in defined functions (e.g. litigation, legal, compliance, risk). The process steps as well as the search criteria used are pre-defined. All e-mails are disposed of after a pre-determined period of time and according to legal requirements. If you do not wish the retention of private e-mails by the C4E , we strongly advise you not to send private, non-business related e-mails to C4E e-mail accounts.
DESCRIPTIONS.data_security_1: C4E applies and ensures that service providers apply technical and organizational security measures that are appropriate to protect personal data against accidental or unlawful destruction or accidental loss, alteration, unauthorized disclosure or access and against all other unlawful forms of processing.
DESCRIPTIONS.data_security_2: The accessing and entering of information on the C4E Website by users take place over the Internet which is an open and unprotected network. This data transfer takes place in non-encrypted form. Therefore, we are not able to guarantee the security of your data during the transfer to the Website. You confirm to be aware of the risks of unencrypted transmission of data via the Internet. C4E shall not be liable for any damage caused by such transfer. For this reason, please do not send us any confidential or sensitive personal data.
DESCRIPTIONS.data_security_3: You may communicate with us by e-mail. E-mail messages sent over the Internet are neither confidential nor secure. They may be viewed by third parties, lost, intercepted or altered. E-mails may be transferred across national borders, even if both sender and recipient are located in the same country. C4E or any company of the C4E  will not be liable for any damages suffered in connection with the use of e-mails or any other electronic messaging system when communicating with us.
DESCRIPTIONS.retained_data: C4E retains the personal information collected over the C4E Website for as long as required or permitted by law and regulations. Comments that you provide to us using the commenting functionality of the C4E Website are generally deleted after one year, unless C4E has a particular business interest in such information in which case the comments are retained for a longer period of time, subject to applicable data protection law.
DESCRIPTIONS.children_protection: C4E does not wish to collect over the C4E Website personal data from individuals under the age of 18. Individuals under the age of 18 are requested to receive permission from their parent or legal guardian before providing any personal data to C4E on the C4E Website.
DESCRIPTIONS.external_websites: From the C4E Website you are able to obtain access to websites operated by third parties (“External Websites”). This Privacy Policy does not apply to External Websites. External Websites are not monitored or maintained by C4E. We are not responsible for the privacy policies of any External Websites (see Terms of Use). Please read the privacy policy of each External Website prior to accessing or sending personal data to the site.
DESCRIPTIONS.accessing_your_data: You are entitled to ask for a copy of your personal data which has been collected online and stored on the C4E Website. You may also ask to have your data rectified or deleted as required by applicable data protection law. For more information please contact us using details in the contact box above.
DESCRIPTIONS.data_controller: C4E is responsible as data controller for the processing of your personal data on the C4E Website under Swiss data protection law to the extent applicable.
DESCRIPTIONS.contact: If you have any questions relating to the processing of your data or this Privacy Policy, please contact us using the general contact functionality provided on this Website.

BUY_TOKENS_VIEW.DESCRIPTION_FIRST_CONTENT: Chain4Energy (C4E) tokens play an integral role in our decentralized energy ecosystem. They serve as a medium of exchange, facilitating transactions within our platform, and enabling access to our suite of energy solutions.
BUY_TOKENS_VIEW.DESCRIPTION_SECOND_CONTENT:
The C4E public token sale offers potential investors an opportunity to secure tokens at an attractive price of $0.085 per token. Post token generation event (TGE), investors can look forward to a 20% release, followed by a six-month vesting period.

Payment for the tokens can be made in Fiat (PLN, USD, EUR), or in the stablecoins USDC and USDT. We accept payments through Ethereum, BNB Smart Chain, and Polygon. The need for KYC procedure depends on your investment level.
BUY_TOKENS_VIEW.REQUIREMENTS_TIP: Depending on the amount invested the different KYC (Know Your Customer) level can be applied.

SUMMARY.FIRST_LINE: Your order no. {orderId} has been placed successfully
SUMMARY.SECOND_LINE: Your order have to be paid in 24 hours, after this time it will be automatically cancelled.

HINTS.TERMS: All the Public Sale terms are available at:
HINTS.CLAIMER_ADDRESS:
Provide an address of the wallet you will use for claiming the tokens. It has to be an C4E wallet address. 
If you don't have it follow this instructions with Keplr wallet:
https://docs.c4e.io/usersGuide/auth.html
HINTS.SOURCE_ADDRESS:
Please provide your EVM wallet address you will send your stablecoins from.
Please do not use a CEX exchange address.
